variants.name: Not
variants.description: Evaluates JavaScript's Not (!) operator on value.

variants.name: Open or close string
variants.description: Creates a string containing the text between two of these operators. If no close string operator is present, one is placed at the end of the code.

variants.name: Splat
variants.description: Passes the elements of arr as arguments to the parent operator.

variants.name: Modulus
variants.description: Divides the dividend by the divisor and returns the remainder.

variants.name: And
variants.description: Evaluates JavaScript's And (&&) operator on left and right.

variants.name: Multiply
variants.description: Multiplies left by right when either argument is a number and the other is a number or array.

variants.name: Repeat
variants.description: Returns value repeated for provided number of repetitions.

variants.name: Cartesian product
variants.description: Returns the cartesian product of left and right if both types are identical.

variants.name: Add
variants.description: Adds left to right.

variants.name: Concatenate
variants.description: Concatenates left and right.

variants.name: Push
variants.description: Appends the value to the end of the arr.

variants.name: Unshift
variants.description: Inserts the value at the beginning of arr.

variants.name: Pair
variants.description: Returns a two-element array containing left and right.

variants.name: Subtract
variants.description: Subtracts right from left.

variants.name: Remove
variants.description: If value can be found in arr, the first instance is removed.

variants.name: Divide
variants.description: Divides each element of the dividend by the divisor.

variants.name: Split
variants.description: Returns an array of value split by separator.

variants.name: Semi-colon
variants.description: Places a semi-colon at the location specified.

variants.name: Less than
variants.description: Tests whether left is less than right using the default JavaScript comparator.

variants.name: Lower slice
variants.description: Returns the first num elements of arr.

variants.name: Assign
variants.description: Assigns value to variable symbol.

variants.name: Greater than
variants.description: Tests whether left is greater than right using the default JavaScript comparator.

variants.name: Upper slice
variants.description: Returns the last num elements of arr.

variants.name: Ternary
variants.description: Returns valueWhenTrue if condition is truthy in JavaScript, otherwise returns valueWhenFalse.

variants.name: Get value at index
variants.description: Returns the value at lookup[index].

variants.name: Change case
variants.description: Changes the case of each character in str.

variants.name: Flatten
variants.description: Returns arr flattened.

variants.name: For each
variants.description: Executes a for loop using enumerable, assigning each value to element and then performing action.

variants.name: False
variants.description: Returns false.

variants.name: Break
variants.description: Includes a break in the current execution path.

variants.name: Continue
variants.description: Includes a continue in the current execution path.

variants.name: Pick random
variants.description: Returns a random element from arr.

variants.name: Index of
variants.description: Returns the index of value in lookup.

variants.name: Factorial
variants.description: Returns the factorial of num.

variants.name: Sign
variants.description: Returns the sign of num.

variants.name: Inverse cosine
variants.description: Returns the inverse cosine of num.

variants.name: Maximum
variants.description: Returns the maximum value of arr.

variants.name: Radix
variants.description: Returns the value in the specified radix.

variants.name: Inverse sine
variants.description: Returns the inverse sine of num.

variants.name: Inverse tangent
variants.description: Returns the inverse tangent of value while considering quadrant.

variants.name: Ceiling
variants.description: Returns the ceiling of num.

variants.name: Floor
variants.description: Returns the floor of num.

variants.name: Absolute value
variants.description: Returns the absolute value of num.

variants.name: Clamp
variants.description: Returns num clamped to [lowerBound, upperBound].

variants.name: Cosine
variants.description: Returns the cosine of num.

variants.name: Minimum
variants.description: Returns the minimum value of arr.

variants.name: Round to nearest integer
variants.description: Returns num rounded to the nearest integer.

variants.name: Square root
variants.description: Returns the square root of num.

variants.name: Random
variants.description: Returns a random number in the range [0, 1].

variants.name: Sine
variants.description: Returns the sine of num.

variants.name: Tangent
variants.description: Returns the tangent of num.

variants.name: Pop
variants.description: Removes and returns the last element of arr.

variants.name: Regular expression
variants.description: Returns a regular expression created from str.

variants.name: Replace
variants.description: Searches original for instances of match and replaces with replacement.

variants.name: True
variants.description: Returns true.

variants.name: Evaluate
variants.description: Evaluates the value.

variants.name: Escape
variants.description: Returns a string which contains the provided value.

variants.name: Power
variants.description: Raises value to the power of exponent.

variants.name: Negate
variants.description: Reverses the sign of num.

variants.name: Reverse
variants.description: Reverses value.

variants.name: Set value at index
variants.description: Assigns lookup[index] = value.

variants.name: Character code
variants.description: Returns the character code of value.

variants.name: Do
variants.description: Repeatedly Evaluates expr and assigns to var for numberOfTimes.

variants.name: Exponential
variants.description: Returns the exponential function evaluated at num.

variants.name: End
variants.description: Returns the last element of value.

variants.name: For loop
variants.description: Iterates from var=start to end, performing statement each iteration.

variants.name: Increment
variants.description: Returns num incremented by one.

variants.name: Head
variants.description: Returns the first element of value.

variants.name: Join
variants.description: Returns a string of arr joined by value.

variants.name: Pair assign
variants.description: Assigns pair[0] to variableOne and pair[1] to variableTwo..

variants.name: Natural logarithm
variants.description: Returns the natural logarithm of num.

variants.name: Length
variants.description: Returns the length of value.

variants.name: Map
variants.description: Applies expr to var for each element of arr.

variants.name: Print
variants.description: Writes the value to the output stream.

variants.name: Identical
variants.description: Tests whether left is exactly equal to right using JavaScript's Equal (===) operator.

variants.name: Range
variants.description: Returns a range created from the value provided.

variants.name: Sum
variants.description: Returns the sum of the array.

variants.name: Decrement
variants.description: Returns num decremented by one.

variants.name: Tail
variants.description: Returns the tail of value (all elements except the first).

variants.name: Element-wise add
variants.description: Adds each of the elements in left with the corresponding element in right.

variants.name: Wrap with array
variants.description: Returns single element array containing value.

variants.name: Or
variants.description: Evaluates JavaScript's Or (||) operator on the left and right arguments.

variants.name: Compare
variants.description: Compares left to right using binary comparison on matching value types. Numeric collation is assumed for string comparisons.
